lead_paragraph: Now-departed England boss Roy Hodgson could have scarcely have imagined that his time as England boss would be brought to an end by one of the disciples he created as he cut a swathe through Swedish soccer 30 years ago.

headline.print_headline: Hodgson Undone by Pupil Lagerback as England Crash Out
headline.main: Hodgson Undone by Pupil Lagerback as England Crash Out

snippet: Now-departed England boss Roy Hodgson could have scarcely have imagined that his time as England boss would be brought to an end by one of the disciples he created as he cut a swathe through Swedish soccer 30 years ago....
